# Description

I am a PhD student at the BIGR group at the Erasmus MC and my project focuses on developing AI-assisted diagnostic algorithms to improve early diagnosis and differentiation of Frontotemporal dementia subtypes. I am also involved in the RIOT Open Science Club Rotterdam.

```{r radarPlot, eval = FALSE}

member_name <- "Laura Dias"
special_skill <- c("machine learning", "cat lover")

OS_skills <- read_csv(here("static/OS_skills.csv")) %>%
  dplyr::filter(name %in% c("max", "min", member_name)) %>%
  dplyr::select(c("open source software", "reproducible analysis", "data sharing", "preregistration", all_of(special_skill), "open access", "data management"))

# custom radar plot
radarchart(OS_skills,
  axistype = 0, seg = 10,
  pcol = alpha("#002328", 0.8), pfcol = alpha("#00B969", 0.6), plwd = 4, centerzero = TRUE, # polygon
  cglcol = "#7e7e7e", axislabcol = "#002328", caxislabels = seq(0, 10, 2), cglwd = 0.8 # grid
)

```
